Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCell(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Fully renders content of cell, representing a specific day. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (in:) and drawCellTitle (in:), in that order.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellBackground(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Renders background of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (state:color:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.name: drawCellTitle(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Renders title of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellTitle (title:attributes:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:14C.abstract: Default implementation of day cell background drawing. Fills frame of context with color if state != CPCDayCellState.normal.

Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.name: clamped(to:)
Enums/CPCViewSelection.html#/s:14CrispyC.abstract: Returns a subset of this selection that contains days matching specified date constraints.
Forms union of two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Forms union of two values and returns it leaving original values unchanged.
Subtracts from the first value days that are selected byn the second one and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Calculates selection that contains all of the left-hand-side days except those contained in right-hand-side one and returns it leaving original unchanged.

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.name: sizeThatFits(_:with:)
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.abstract: Asks the view type to calculate and return the size for its instance that best fits the specified size.

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.name: widthThatFits(height:with:)
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.abstract: Asks the view type to calculate and return width for its instance given a specific height constraint.

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.name: heightThatFits(width:with:)
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.abstract: Asks the view type to calculate and return height for its instance given a specific width constraint.

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.name: layoutAttributes
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.abstract: Current layout attributes associated with this view instance.

Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.name: sizeThatFits(_:attributes:)
Protocols/CPCViewMeasuring.html#/s:14Cri.abstract: Asks the view to calculate and return the size that best fits the specified size.

Protocols/CPCViewLayoutAttributes.html#/.name: roundingScale
Protocols/CPCViewLayoutAttributes.html#/.abstract: Scale factor to use for resulting frames/sizes rounding. Typically should be equal to 1.0 / UIScreen.main.nativeScale.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: titleFont

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: titleColor

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: titleAlignment

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: titleStyle

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: titleMargins

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: dayCellFont

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: separatorColor

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: selection

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: cellRenderer

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: dayCellTextColor(for:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: setDayCellTextColor(_:for:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: dayCellBackgroundColor(for:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: setDayCellBackgroundColor(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Sets the background color of the day cell to use for the specified state.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: See CPCViewTitleStyle.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: select(_:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes a consecutive range of days from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes days from given collection from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.name: deselect(_:)
Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Removes days from given collection from the specified selection.

Protocols/CPCViewProtocol.html.name: CPCViewProtocol

Protocols/CPCFixedAspectRatioView.html.abstract: A view type that sizes instances using linear equation.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: start
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Earliest date that is included in date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: end
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Earliest date that is not included in date interval and is later than start (analogous to Range <Date>.upperBound).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: duration
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Duration of date interval. Default implementation returns self.end.timeIntervalSince (self.start).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: prev
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Previous interval (an interval that has the same duration and ends when this interval starts).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.name: next
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Next interval (an interval that has the same duration and starts when this interval ends).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html.name: CPCDateInterval

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: CPCDateIntervalInitializable
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Common protocol for types that can be initialized with a date interval.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.name: CPCCalendarUnitSymbol
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.abstract: Calendar unit that has a localizable symbol in addition to an integer value.

Structs/CPCDay.html.name: CPCDay
Structs/CPCDay.html.abstract: Calendar unit that represents a single day.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get an arbitrary scaled value for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get an arbitrary scaled value for a given contentSizeCategory.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledInsets(_:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get insets, scaled for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledFont(_:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get font, scaled for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html.name: CPCFontMetricsProtocol
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that hides Dynamic Font implementation differences between iOS 10 and iOS 11+.

Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.name: requiredComponents
Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.abstract: Collection of Calendar.Components that are required for proper initialization of this type’s instances.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Type for which this one serves as a backing storage.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Creates a new storage for a calendar unit that contains a specific date.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: startDate(using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Get an earliest date that is contained in a backed calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: distance(to:using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Calculate distance between this value and other one, measured in the unit’s durations.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: advanced(by:using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Calculate a backing value with specific distance from represented one.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: indices(for:using:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Calculate all possible indices for a given compound unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cachedElement(at:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Query calendar units cache for subunit of a compound calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cacheElement(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Cache a calendar subunit for specified position in this unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cachedIndex(of:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Query calendar units cache for position of subunit in this one.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cacheIndex(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Cache position of a subunit inside this one.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: subscript(ordinal:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Returns a subunit at nth place using zero-based indexes.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: BackingType
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Type serving as a storage for calendar unit info.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: representedUnit
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Calendar unit that is represented by this model type.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: calendar
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Calendar that is used to calculate unit’s start an end dates and related units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: calendarWrapper
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Unit’s calendar that is wrapped in CalendarWrapper object for performance reasons.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: backingValue
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Raw value of calendar unit, e.g. month and year values for CPCMonth.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: cachedDistance(to:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Query calendar units cache for distance between two units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: cacheDistance(_:to:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Cache a distance between two calendar units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: cachedAdvancedUnit(by:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Query calendar units cache for a unit that has specific distance from this one.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: cacheUnitValue(_:advancedBy:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Cache a calendar unit that has specific distance from this one.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.name: cachedCommonUnit(for:calendar:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:14Cris.abstract: Cache a caclendar unit as a frequently used one for the specified key.

Classes/CPCCalendarWrapper.html.name: CPCCalendarWrapper
Classes/CPCCalendarWrapper.html.abstract: Wraps a Calendar instance into a reference type to enable short-circuit equality evaluation using identity operator.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html.name: CPCCalendarUnit
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html.abstract: Common protocol implementing most of CPCDay, CPCWeek, CPCMonth and CPCYear functionality.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html.name: CPCCompoundCalendarUnit
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html.abstract: Protocol, implementing a collection of smaller units that are contained in this calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: CPCCalendarUnitBackingType
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Common protocol for types that are suitable as backing storage of CPCCalendarUnit instances.

Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.abstract: Expresses that a type can be initialized using DateComponents.

Protocols/DateComponentsConvertible.html.name: DateComponentsConvertible
Protocols/DateComponentsConvertible.html.abstract: Expresses that a type can be represented as DateComponents.

Enums/CPCCommonCalendarUnitCacheKey.html.name: CPCCommonCalendarUnitCacheKey
Enums/CPCCommonCalendarUnitCacheKey.html.abstract: This enumeration serves as cache key for frequently used (current, previous & next) units.

Other Typealiases.html.name: Other Type Aliases
Other Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
